name: Testo Rider
description:
WELCOME TO THE JUNGLE

Run across the streets of a stereotypical 80's LA while fleeing from the local Russian mafia. Find secrets and try multiple paths in order to earn the best score and challenge yourself !

CONTENT

Testo Rider is a 2d platformer game in pixel art. It's a speedrunning game which means your goal is to beat the timer, over and over again in order to break people's previous records !

It will be easy to finish the game if you are used to 2D platformers, but, trust me, it won't be that easy to break the world record.

Have fun, and keep in mind that a russian helicopter will never be as fast as your legs.
